/usr/bin/g++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/base3.dir/Parallel_scan/base.cpp.o CMakeFiles/base3.dir/common/clutils.cpp.o  -o base3   -L/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc  -L/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL  -Wl,-rpath,/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc:/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL:/home/asus/Documents/OpenCL/build/OpenCL-ICD-Loader OpenCL-ICD-Loader/libOpenCL.so.1.2 -lpthread -ldl
